sub_fields.label: Other view
sub_fields.name: custom_shortcodes_post_lists_view_other
sub_fields.instructions: The file must be located in resources/views/shortcodes and must named like so: template-name.blade.php.

sub_fields.label: Terms
sub_fields.name: custom_shortcodes_post_lists_tax_query_param_terms
sub_fields.instructions: List elements, comma separated, no space.

sub_fields.label: Value
sub_fields.name: custom_shortcodes_post_lists_meta_query_value
sub_fields.instructions: List elements, comma separated, no space. Multiple values are considered only if the operator is IN, NOT IN, BETWEEN or NOT BETWEEN.

sub_fields.label: Suppress filters
sub_fields.name: custom_shortcodes_post_lists_suppress_filters
sub_fields.instructions: Suppressing filters delete filters like those coming from WPML. Leave empty for no alteration.
